price: (174) O mankind, there has come to you a conclusive proof from your Lord, and We have sent down to you a clear light.[237]
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَكُم بُرۡهَٰنٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَأَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ نُورٗا مُّبِينٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu qad jāakum bur'hānun min rabbikum wa-anzalnā ilaykum nūran mubīnan
